arts.ttl: 1 assist, 1 debut, 1 cameo: How did Barcelona’s stars fare for Spain vs Denmark?
arts.sum: A trio of Barcelona stars played their part this evening, as Spain got the better of Denmark in a Nations League clash. Just how, though, did they fare? The leading…

arts.ttl: Spain beat Denmark, secure top spot in NL group
arts.sum: Mikel Oyarzabal and Ayoze Perez scored to give Spain a 2-1 win over hosts Denmark on Friday to secure top spot in their Nations League group and a place in next year's quarterfinals.

arts.ttl: Denmark 1-2 Spain: Highlights, man of the match, stats as La Roja secure top spot in UEFA Nations League group
arts.sum: Spain secure top spot in Group 4 of League A in the UEFA Nations League courtesy of a 2-1 victory over Denmark in Copenhagen.

arts.ttl: Four wins in a row for Spain after narrow victory over Denmark in Copenhagen
arts.sum: Spain have secured top spot in their UEFA Nations League group after a fourth win in a row in the competition, which came about with a 2-1 win over Denmark in Copenhagen. La Roja knew that a victory was needed to ensure that they would be seeded for the upcoming quarter-final draw, and they were […] The post Four wins in a row for Spain after narrow victory over Denmark in Copenhagen appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: 'We deserved more': Arsenal excuses coming to the fore as David Raya makes claim about Chelsea

arts.ttl: Lee Carsley urges England to follow Germany and Spain’s trust in youth
arts.sum: Interim manager backs promotion of under-21 players Carsley: youngsters who faced Greece ‘in good position’ Lee Carsley believes England will have a better chance of glory if they follow Germany and Spain in promoting players who have won trophies at youth level. Carsley, who steps aside for Thomas Tuchel after Sunday’s home game against the Republic of Ireland, has not been afraid to bring in inexperienced players during his spell as interim head coach. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Germany U21s now unbeaten in 12 after victory over Denmark in test fixture
arts.sum: Goals from returning Germany U21 actors Youssoufa Moukoko and Nathaniel Brown helped the squad representing Germany at the highest youth level top Denmark and New Tivoli stadium in Aachen on Friday afternoon. Hannover's Nicolo Tresoldi also scored in the 3-0 victory over Stefan Højer's visiting Danes in a friendly. Di Salvo's men have another friendly scheduled in France on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star ruled out of Spain-Denmark clash in Nations League with two others
arts.sum: Spain manager Luis de la Fuente has left Pau Cubarsi out of his squad to face Denmark on Friday night in the Nations League, as is the case for Osasuna’s on loan winger Bryan Zaragoza. Neither will take part at Parken in Copenhagen. The Danish side will seeking revenge for their defeat in Iberia, but […] The post Barcelona star ruled out of Spain-Denmark clash in Nations League with two others appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star left out of Spain’s matchday squad to face Denmark
arts.sum: Barcelona star Pau Cubarsí has not been included in Spain’s matchday setup for the country’s meeting with Denmark later today. As much was confirmed on Friday morning, by La Roja…
